channel.title: Vince Kaichan
channel.description: site updates and blog posts for vince kaichan

item.title: song sorting
item.description: added the ability to sort tables by date or name, ascending and descending. click on the column header to sort by that column in ascending order, click it again to sort by descending order

item.title: new album: lost in time
item.description: new album! lost in time, you can also find it under the 'albums/EPs' section below. if you buy it on bandcamp, your purchase will be donated to My Block, My Hood, My City, a nonprofit organization that helps underprivileged youth in chicago.

item.title: rss feed now available
item.description: some friends said i should add an rss feed for these news posts so here it is. please let me know if anything isn't working correctly

item.title: first post
item.description: added this little news feed to the site. most of the entries will just be website updates/music release announcements but i plan on eventually using it for blog posts (once i figure out what i want to blog about...)
